title: Ambition's Queen
description: England 1536. Bridget Manning is forced to leave the safety and tranquility of her home at Rivers Abbey in order to join the household of the queen, Anne Boleyn. Once there she enters a world seething with intrigue and plots against her new mistress. Will Bridget be able to navigate her way through the dangerous maze of the court or will it destroy her as it is destroying her queen?
author: V.E. Lynne
